arts.ttl: Neymar makes pre-contract offer to Barcelona
arts.sum: Former Barcelona star Neymar Jr. recently offered his services up to the Blaugrana on a pre-contract with a view to the summer. That’s according to journalist Joan Fontes, who has…

arts.ttl: Latest transfer news:Isak prefers Liverpool move as Neymar eyes Barcelona return
arts.sum: The transfer window has closed for every top European league but planning will already be all underway for the summer window. Teams are working tirelessly behind the scenes on identifying targets...

arts.ttl: Neymar plans stunning return to Europe, dreams of Barcelona
arts.sum: The 33-year-old completed a free transfer back to his homeland in January following his release from Al-Hilal, where doubts had been raised by head coach Jorge Jesus about the player’s ability to hit his top level again. Now Neymar is going out to prove the Portuguese boss wrong by showing the world what he can do at Santos and winning a place back at Barcelona, Cadena SER reports.

arts.ttl: Al Hilal to make summer attempt for Inter’s Nicolo Barella
arts.sum: Serie A giants Inter would have to be wary of interest in midfielder Nicolo Barella, who has been impressive for them across many seasons. Marco Conterio has provided a background…

arts.ttl: WORLD'S GREATEST!: Ronaldo tops Messi, Mbappe and Neymar in top 100 athletes list
arts.sum: Benzema’s $108m salary with Al-Ittihad marks his status as the ninth-highest paid player in world sport despite only making $8m annually with endorsements – the third lowest in the top ten ahead of boxers Fury and Oleksandr Usyk. Cristiano Ronaldo has once again been named the highest-paid athlete in the world, beating out rivals such as Lionel Messi, Neymar and Kylian Mbappe .

arts.ttl: Neymar eyeing summer move back to Barcelona
arts.sum: A head-turning claim has come to the fore in the Spanish media on Thursday, surrounding Barcelona and ex-winger Neymar Jr. This comes amid the suggestion that the latter has set…

arts.ttl: Al Hilal go public in pursuit of Liverpool’s Mohamed Salah
arts.sum: Al Hilal manager Jorge Jesus has admitted he would like to bring Liverpool forward Mohamed Salah to Saudi Arabia this summer. Salah is a long-standing transfer target for Saudi Arabian sides, with a desire to bring the Egyptian to the big-spending league. The 32-year-old’s status as one of the world’s finest players and the most […] The post Al Hilal go public in pursuit of Liverpool’s Mohamed Salah first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Puma Future 8 'Creativity' Neymar Signature Boots Released
arts.sum: PUMA continues its 'Creativity' series with the next Future 8 signature shoes for Neymar in a colorful design.
